name: InterfaceChest
title: 接口箱
author: Peppe
description: 气流箱可以在传送带上推/拉物品。箱子连接到相邻的库存:可以从相邻的库存和传送带上拉取或推送货物。
description_original: Slipstream chests to push/pull items to belts.  Chest connects to adjacent inventories to: Pull from adjacent inventory and push to belt or Pull from belt and push to adjacent inventory.
